Multiple companies: We found multiple companies related to your ID-card. Please, pick the one you would like to pay with:
No id in list: Your ID-card is not in the list of contractual customers
Low funds: You have not enough funds on your customer account to cover this purchase
Close and try or: Close the window and try again or:
Complete remove or add id: Complete operation, remove or add more ID-cards
No discounts for id: Your ID-card do not have the right for discount
Discount already used: Your ticket already registered on the ship
Following ids: Following ID-card(s) added to your booking:

Try another id or press done: Press "Done" button below and enter another ID-card
